mapper.sql: m.id, m.menu_name, m.parent_id, m.menu_sort, m.path, m.component, m.query_param, m.is_frame, m.is_cache, m.menu_type, m.visible, m.status, m.perms, m.icon, m.create_time, m.update_time, m.create_by, m.update_by, m.remark, (select menu_name from sys_menu where id = m.parent_id) as parent_name
mapper.select:
select distinct
from sys_menu m inner join sys_role_menu rm on m.id = rm.menu_id inner join sys_user_role ur on rm.role_id = ur.role_id inner join sys_user u on u.id = ur.user_id
u.id = #{params.userId} and m.status = '0'
and m.menu_name like concat('%', #{menuName}, '%')
and m.visible = #{visible}
and m.menu_type = #{menuType}
order by m.parent_id, m.menu_sort

select
from sys_menu m where m.status = '0' and m.menu_type in ('M', 'C', 'F') order by m.parent_id, m.menu_sort

select distinct
from sys_menu m left join sys_role_menu rm on m.id = rm.menu_id left join sys_user_role ur on rm.role_id = ur.role_id left join sys_user u on u.id = ur.user_id where u.id = #{userId} and m.status = '0' order by m.parent_id, m.menu_sort

select distinct
from sys_menu m left join sys_role_menu rm on m.id = rm.menu_id where rm.role_id = #{roleId} and m.status = '0' order by m.parent_id, m.menu_sort
select distinct m.perms from sys_menu m where m.status = '0' and m.perms is not null and m.perms != ''
select distinct m.perms from sys_menu m inner join sys_role_menu rm on m.id = rm.menu_id where rm.role_id = #{roleId} and m.status = '0' and m.perms is not null and m.perms != ''

select distinct m.perms from sys_menu m left join sys_role_menu rm on m.id = rm.menu_id left join sys_user_role ur on rm.role_id = ur.role_id where ur.user_id = #{userId} and m.status = '0' and m.perms is not null and m.perms != ''

select m.id as menu_id from sys_menu m left join sys_role_menu rm on m.id = rm.menu_id where rm.role_id = #{roleId} and m.status = '0'
and m.parent_id not in ( select distinct parent_id from sys_menu where parent_id is not null )
mapper.insert: insert into sys_menu ( tenant_id, parent_id, menu_name, menu_type, menu_sort, path, component, query_param, is_frame, is_cache, visible, status, perms, icon, remark, create_by, create_time ) values ( ifnull(#{params.tenantId}, 1), #{parentId}, #{menuName}, #{menuType}, #{orderNum}, #{path}, #{component}, #{query}, #{isFrame}, #{isCache}, #{visible}, #{status}, #{perms}, #{icon}, #{remark}, #{createBy}, now() )
